name: 黃如瑩
objective:
Objectives 課程目標: 
We will explore an array of intriguing social/cultural issues while enjoying a selection of stories, in multi-media forms, suitable for teenagers/young adults. 
These stories serve as best materials (1) not only for language learning and cultural literacy (2) but also for the cultivation of full language skills. 
For each story, we will engage in group discussions about the issues addressed in the text to cultivate our critical thinking.

scorePolicy:
1. Presence: 30% 
2. Homework and participation in classroom discussions: 30% 
3. Mid-term oral report with Prof. Huang on the novel of your choice: 10%
